holidays.title: AFL Grand Final Friday
holidays.description: It's Aussie Madness as a nation of footy-crazed fans celebrate their most popular sporting event!

holidays.title: American Indian Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn everything about Native American Day. Celebrate with us today!

holidays.title: Celebrate Bisexuality Day
holidays.description: Today is the day for bi visibility.

holidays.title: Education Technology Day
holidays.description: It’s time to appreciate and learn more about technology on this Educational Technology Day!

holidays.title: First Day of Autumn
holidays.description: The cool air of autumn approaches — welcome a season that needs warm clothing and hearty meals.

holidays.title: Hug A Vegetarian Day
holidays.description: Be sure to eat your greens today, or hug someone who does this on the reg!

holidays.title: International Day of Sign Languages
holidays.description: Want to learn a new language? Sign language is just the perfect pick!

holidays.title: Michigan Indian Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the native peoples of Michigan this September.

holidays.title: National AFM Day
holidays.description: Get to learn more about A.F.M., the disease recently discovered and spiking in numbers.

holidays.title: National Apple Cider Vinegar Day
holidays.description: It might be bitter to swallow, but here are some facts to help the medicine go down.

holidays.title: National Baker Day
holidays.description: Baker is the last name with pedigree and ancient roots dating back to the Middle Ages.

holidays.title: National BRAVE Day
holidays.description: Who runs the world? Women do!

holidays.title: National Checkers Day
holidays.description: We celebrate memories of political pets!

holidays.title: National Dogs in Politics Day
holidays.description: The First Dog of the United States holds an important place in our hearts.

holidays.title: National Field Marketer’s Day
holidays.description: Time to prepare your very best sales pitch on this National Field Marketers’ Day!

holidays.title: National Go With Your Gut Day
holidays.description: It’s time for that health check with National Go With Your Gut Day!

holidays.title: National Great American Pot Pie Day
holidays.description: Get your bellies ready, and your hearts merry, for this savory celebration.

holidays.title: National Snack Stick Day
holidays.description: Get yourself some snack sticks as we celebrate a traditional family snack.

holidays.title: National Temperature Control Day
holidays.description: Surprise! Summer does not begin on Memorial Day — nor does it end on Labor Day.

holidays.title: Native American Day
holidays.description: This is a holiday observed in several states in celebration of Native American culture.

holidays.title: Porthcawl Elvis Festival
holidays.description: This is an exciting festival that pays tribute to one of the biggest stars that ever lived.

holidays.title: Redhead Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Redheads are like rare birds of paradise, making up just four percent of the world’s population!

holidays.title: Restless Legs Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get excited as we dish out some hardcore educational tips and facts about a lifelong neurological condition!

holidays.title: Seed Gathering Season
holidays.description: Learn about the history of this season and fun ways to get involved.

holidays.title: September Equinox
holidays.description: Did you know the sky is both a clock and a calendar? Find out why.

holidays.title: Teal Talk Day
holidays.description: Gather your friends, wear teal for a day out together and talk about ovarian cancer!

holidays.title: The September Equinox
holidays.description: The September Equinox is an important astronomical event with different meanings around the world.

holidays.title: Za’atar Day
holidays.description: Everyone gather at the dining table because today is Za’atar Day! Celebrate with us!

holidays.title: J.I.’s Birthday
holidays.description: From rap competition winner to Spotify star, J.I. is a rap legend.

holidays.title: Jermaine Dupri’s Birthday
holidays.description: From rapping to writing songs to producing music, Jermaine Dupri has done it all.

holidays.title: John Coltrane’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn about the jazz legend John Coltrane and how his influence has changed the world.

holidays.title: Kalani Hilliker’s Birthday
holidays.description: All the world’s a stage for this incredible young dancer and contortionist.

holidays.title: Matt Hardy’s Birthday
holidays.description: He may have a few gimmicks, but his wrestling talent sure isn’t one.
